page.title: 13BEVENDEAN IN 1985
page.content: They are building a better disco, it is quite big. They have built an adventure playground for children to play in. We have electricity now but the people in the old days didn't. We have a lot more trees now. We have other good games like{"Guess Who?"}and {snap}& other games. There are lots of houses here. We have televisions in nearly all the houses and in the school. There is a club up in the church hall on Monday evenings. On Sunday mornings we sing in the church. We have computers at home and in school. They used to use the barn as a church, but now they have built a proper one.There used to be a farm here but they have built a school in the same place.Hardly any people had cars in those days but now most people have them now.
